title: Podcast Episode 159.2 – V-DAY AUCTION BY EMMA BRAY
description:
Our audiobook this week is V-Day Auction by Emma Bray

Valentine is a no-nonsense businessman, but a chance encounter with pretty little Victoria leaves him with more than business on his mind. The only problem? He doesn’t have a clue who the cute little angel is. She bumps into him and then slips away before he’s ever able to utter a word.

Fate steps in when he comes across her again. But fate is an evil temptress because his little angel is being auctioned.

And there’s no way he’s going to let anyone else buy her.

V-Day Auction eBook: https://amzn.to/3rCP8fw
Emma Bray eBooks: https://amzn.to/3uD3sGO
Claiming the Runaway: https://amzn.to/33dlSCQ
GIVEAWAY: https://bit.ly/3uC6Cuw
Signed AR Paperbacks: https://bit.ly/3sv5rub
New Alexa Riley – A Flurry of Love: https://bit.ly/338FiJ1

Other Books Mentioned
SHARING THEIR NANNY by Sam Crescent
MEN OF HIDDEN JUSTICE series by Melanie Moreland
ALL RHODES LEAD HERE by Mariana Zapata
LOVE ME WITH LIES Series - Taryn Fisher
